# CRbasic300

> CRBasic 3.00 series â€” Documentation and references for CRBasic 300-series dataloggers. Use these links for instruction reference, parameters, skins, and examples specific to CRBasic 300.

Important notes:

- This folder contains the 3.00 series documentation and assets.
- For older 1.x series, see the sibling `CRbasic1x/llms.txt`.

## Docs

- [Program structure and components](./Info/ProgramStructure.md): structure and major components for CRBasic programs.
- [Templates and skins](./Skin/): UI skin resources and templates.
- [Terms and glossary](./terms/): glossary of terms used in the 3.00 series docs.

## Instructions

- [Instruction reference directory](./Instructions/): detailed instruction docs for CRBasic 300. This directory contains individual instruction docs (over 800 files). Example entries:

- [abs](./Instructions/abs.md)
- [and](./Instructions/and.md)
- [average](./Instructions/average.md)
- [for/next](./Instructions/fornext.md)
- [if then else](./Instructions/ifthenelse.md)
 
- [Complete Instructions list (full enumeration)](./instructions-llms.txt)

## Parameters

- [Parameter files directory](./parameters/): parameter examples and config files. This directory contains a large number of parameter reference files (each parameter used by instructions and examples). Example entries:

- [interval](./parameters/interval.md)
- [filename](./parameters/filename.md)
- [destination](./parameters/destination.md)

If you want a complete `parameters/` expansion, I can enumerate all parameter files in this section as well.

- [Complete Parameters list (full enumeration)](./parameters-llms.txt)

## Assets

- [Assets folder](./assets/): images and other supporting assets.

## Optional

- [Full Info index](./Info/): complete list of Info documents for deep reference.
